name: The Matrix II Mesh Chair
description:
Highest Quality Mesh Commercial Grade Unit!

Specifications:
  • Ergonomic concave/convex “S” curve design for comfort and support.
  • Highest quality ventilating meshed upholstery, breathable and heat-less
  • Constructed with matrix, a tested commercial grade mesh!
  • Pneumatic height adjustable & 5 star swivel base.
  • Infinite Tilt mechanism providing free flow back recline & locking positions & tilt tension control.
  • Adjustable Lumbar support.
  • Height adjustable armrests made of polypropylene, soft and very durable; protects arm caps from ripping off (a common problem from banging into desks and metal cabinets).
  • Reinforced metal arm brackets and fabricated welded joints providing a solid quality built unit.
  • Waterfall seat pan: 51w x 51D cm
  • Seat height 47~56 cm; floor to top of arm 65~82 cm; back 47 w X 57 h cm
  • NEW Seat Depth Adjustment

name: Futura Mesh Office Chair
description:
Highest Quality Commercial Grade Mesh Unit!

Futura is balanced with a pneumatic interval mechanism and promotes infinite tilt lock. Think of the smoothness gas lifts provide in height adjustment. 99.9% of all office chairs on the market use a pneumatic gas lift. Now imagine that cylinder for your back recline action. Passed Ansi/Bifma x 5.1 - 2002 Passed EN 1335-1/2/3:2000 Tests Specifications:
  • Interval-free synchronized tilt system for seat & back.
  • Promotes an infinite tilt lock, controlled by lifting button
  • Height adjustable lumbar support.
  • All cast design.
  • Height adjustable armrests.
  • Tilt Tension Control knob.
  • High quality Matrex meshed upholstery, breathable and heat-less.
  • Pneumatic height adjustable.
  • Reclining backrest and Infinite lockable positions.
  • Waterfall Seat pan.
  • Full Manufacturer warranty.
  • Dimensional ship weight 67 x 67 x 46 cm
  • Futura dimensions in CM:
  • back - 56 h x 46 w
  • seat pan - 51 w x 51d
  • arm height from seat - 22 to 30
  • back height from floor - 95 to 103
  • seat height from floor - 47 to 57

name: Chiro Fit II Rollator
description:
ROLLATOR 4 WHEEL FOLDING WALKER STROLLER SEAT 

Features:

Innovative flexible backrests can follow the movement of your body and reduce 50% off the pressure for your spine
    Four legs with wheels and easily controlled by hands while strolling.
    Hand brakes for controlling movement.
    Split back aids in sitting correctly and ultimate comfort in back support.
    Contoured backs prop the sore back appropriately and aid in   relaxing sore back muscles.
    Retractable seat for rest while getting tired during walking.
    The basket under the seat for storage.
    Retractable seat for storage, travel or rest.

Seat pan - 46 x 33 cm
N.W. 10.5 kgs
wheel diameter - 15 cm

ISO 9002 certified
Passed SGS test under International Standard.

name: Chiro Fit II Mesh Office Chair
description:
New innovative pivoting split back system!

Revolutionary rotating back alleviates pressure from lumbar, spinal column, upper & lower back without any adjustments!
This unique support of the back improves blood circulation; thereby alleviating sore muscles & pressure on joints!
The pivoting twin backs independently roll and support the user s they move forward, lean back or side to side without any adjustments required!
Height adjustable back support provides users of varying height a variety of back angle support.

Specifications:
  • New twin back design contours your body and pivots as you move side to side or back and forth.
  • Height adjustable perforated stiff back provides support to lumbar and pressure off spinal column.
  • Highest quality ventilating meshed upholstery for seat... breathable and heat-less (constructed with matrix, a tested commercial grade mesh)
  • Synchro-Tilt mechanism with tilt tension control.
  • Height adjustable armrests made of polypropylene, soft and very durable; protects arm caps from ripping off (a common problem from banging into desks and metal cabinets).
  • Reinforced metal arm brackets and fabricated welded joints providing a solid quality built unit.
  • Pneumatic height adjustable
  • Dimensions (cm):
    Seat - 51 D x 51 W
    From Floor to top of seat - 47 ~ 56
    From Floor to top of arm cap - 66 ~ 75
    Seat pan to top of arm cap - 18 ~ 27
    Floor to top of back - 92 ~ 107
Removable Slip Cover ADDED AT NO EXTRA CHARGE!

name: Airflo Mesh Office Chair
description: High Back Executive Mesh Office Chair Specifications:  Ergonomic concave/convex “S” curve design for comfort and support.  Highest quality ventilating meshed upholstery, breathable and heat-less  (Constructed with matrix, a tested commercial grade mesh)!  High back & full body design.  Double mesh lined seat pan.  Pneumatic height adjustable  Lumbar support.  Fabricated metal arm joints providing re-enforcement for arm strength.  Synchronized-tilt mechanism with anti catapult release ... provides smooth counter sunk recline action.  Tilt Tension Control adjustment.  Height adjustable armrests with adjustable arm caps for various arm lengths, made from commercial grade Polypropylene; protects arm caps from ripping off (a common problem from banging into desks and metal cabinets).  Full Manufacturer warranty.  Brand New, Factory Sealed.

name: Matrix III Mesh Chair
description:
Specifications

    Ergonomic concave/convex “S” curve design for comfort and support.
    Highest quality ventilating meshed upholstery, breathable and heat-less
    Constructed with matrix, a tested commercial grade mesh!
    Pneumatic height adjustable & 5 star swivel base.
    Tilt mechanism providing free flow back recline, tilt tension control & locking positions.
    Adjustable Lumbar support.
    Adjustable head/neck rest (forward & back)
     Height adjustable armrests made of polypropylene, soft and very durable; protects arm caps from ripping off (a common problem from banging into desks and metal cabinets).
    Reinforced metal arm brackets and fabricated welded joints providing a solid quality built unit.
    Waterfall seat pan: 51w x 51D cm
    seat height 47~56 cm; floor to top of arm 65~82 cm; back 47 w X 57 h cm plus headrest.
NEW seat depth adjustment
